00028 //tolua_begin
00029 #define NAME_LEN    20
00030 typedef enum {
00031   STP_DISABLED,
00032   STP_ENABLED
00033 } UID_STP_MODE_T;
00034 
00035 typedef struct {
00036   unsigned short  prio;
00037   unsigned char   addr[6];
00038 } UID_BRIDGE_ID_T;
00039 
00040 typedef struct {
00041   char      vlan_name[NAME_LEN]; /* name of the VLAN, key of the bridge */
00042   char      action; /* 1-create, 0- delete */
00043 } UID_STP_BR_CTRL_T;

00045 #define BR_CFG_STATE        (1L << 0)
00046 #define BR_CFG_PRIO         (1L << 1)
00047 #define BR_CFG_AGE          (1L << 2)
00048 #define BR_CFG_HELLO        (1L << 3)
00049 #define BR_CFG_DELAY        (1L << 4)
00050 #define BR_CFG_FORCE_VER    (1L << 5)
00051 #define BR_CFG_AGE_MODE     (1L << 6)
00052 #define BR_CFG_AGE_TIME     (1L << 7)
00053 #define BR_CFG_HOLD_TIME    (1L << 8)
00054 //tolua_end
00055 #if 0

00057                    BR_CFG_PRIO      | \

00061                    BR_CFG_FORCE_VER | \
00062                    BR_CFG_AGE_MODE  | \
00063                    BR_CFG_AGE_TIME  | \
00064                    BR_CFG_HOLD_TIME
00065 #else
00066 //tolua_begin
00067 #define BR_CFG_ALL BR_CFG_STATE | BR_CFG_PRIO | BR_CFG_AGE | BR_CFG_HELLO | BR_CFG_DELAY | BR_CFG_FORCE_VER | BR_CFG_AGE_MODE | BR_CFG_AGE_TIME | BR_CFG_HOLD_TIME
00068 #endif
00069 typedef struct {
00070   /* service data */
00071   unsigned long     field_mask; /* which fields to change */
00072   UID_STP_MODE_T    stp_enabled;
00073   char              vlan_name[NAME_LEN]; /* name of the VLAN, key of the bridge */
00074 
00075   /* protocol data */
00076   int           bridge_priority;
00077   int           max_age;
00078   int           hello_time;
00079   int           forward_delay;
00080   int           force_version;
00081   int           hold_time;
00082 } UID_STP_CFG_T;
00083 
00084 typedef struct {
00085   /* service data */
00086   char              vlan_name[NAME_LEN]; /* name of the VLAN, key of the bridge */
00087   unsigned long     vlan_id;
00088   UID_STP_MODE_T    stp_enabled;
00089 
00090   /* protocol data */
00091   UID_BRIDGE_ID_T   designated_root;
00092   unsigned long     root_path_cost;
00093 
00094   unsigned long     timeSince_Topo_Change; /* 14.8.1.1.3.b: TBD */

00097 
00098   unsigned short    root_port;
00099   int               max_age;
00100   int               hello_time;
00101   int               forward_delay;
00102   UID_BRIDGE_ID_T   bridge_id;
00103 } UID_STP_STATE_T;

00105 typedef enum {
00106   UID_PORT_DISABLED = 0,
00107   UID_PORT_DISCARDING,
00108   UID_PORT_LEARNING,
00109   UID_PORT_FORWARDING,
00110   UID_PORT_NON_STP
00111 } RSTP_PORT_STATE;
